channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Limit Login Attempts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Limit Login Attempts

item.title: CVE-2022-4303|2024-08-03T01:34:50.145Z -- unknown -- wp%20limit%20login%20attempts
item.description: The WP Limit Login Attempts WordPress plugin through 2.6.4 prioritizes getting a visitor's IP from certain HTTP headers over PHP's REMOTE_ADDR, which makes it possible to bypass IP-based restrictions on login forms.
